headline: How The New Price Target Is Reframing Textron's Story And Fair Value
summary: The recent update to the Textron stock story centers on a shift in the analyst price target, which reflects a fresh read of the company’s outlook and risk profile. This new target will be used as a reference point throughout the article as we unpack what changed in the narrative and why it matters to you as a shareholder or potential investor. Read on to see how you can keep on top of future price target moves and narrative updates so you are not reacting after the fact. Analyst Price Targets...
